article_title: Heart Doctor Pay Drops To $558K As Interventions Scrutinized

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: The nation’s cardiologists are still earning more than a half million dollars a year, but their income took a hit last year as trends in medicine and insurance payment curb the number of heart procedures needed and performed. Cardiology income dropped in 2013 for the first time in five years, with [...]
